description:
Need to remove the last parts of nova-volume in still in nova, namely the SM integration.

There are items in:
- DB
- nova-manage

We should leave the code in volume attach, that is being reviewed as part of a grizzly blueprint.
title: XenAPI SM code still in nova after nova-volume removal
